title: Introduction to C Programming
details: This introductory course in C programming covers the fundamentals of the C language, including variables, data types, control structures, functions, and arrays.

title: Introduction to Algorithms
details: This course focuses on the design and analysis of algorithms. Students will learn various algorithmic techniques, such as sorting, searching, and dynamic programming.

title: Introduction to C++ for DSA
details: Building upon the C programming foundation, this course introduces students to C++, a powerful and versatile programming language. Topics include classes, objects, inheritance etc.

title: Basic Data Structures
details: This course covers fundamental data structures such as arrays, linked lists, stacks, and queues, as well as more advanced structures like trees, graphs, and hash tables. Prerequisite knowledge

title: Introduction to OOP Python
details: This course introduces students to the principles of object-oriented programming (OOP) using the Python programming language. Topics include classes, objects, inheritance and polymorphism.

title: Introduction to C++ for DSA
details: This course provides a comprehensive overview of the software development process, including requirements analysis, design, coding, testing, and maintenance.

title: AWS, Cloud Computing
details: This course provides a comprehensive introduction to Amazon Web Services (AWS), one of the leading cloud computing platforms.EC2, S3, RDS

title: Database (MySQL)
details: This MySQL course covers the essentials of database management using MySQL, a popular open-source relational database management system.

title: Problem-Solving Part
details: This problem-solving course is designed to enhance analytical and critical thinking skills. It focuses on algorithmic problem-solving techniques and strategies.
